Strafe quickly followed Scattershot, jumping into the air, and
transforming, accelerating to catch up.

Lightspeed runs forward, and smoothely transforms, and breaks into a
good pace. He keeps up beside Nosecone. "Why don't we ever think these
things out more rationally?" he asks.
